H0.text: when does the cannes film festival take place. In the summer months (June to August)

H1.text: when does the cannes film festival take place. Every October

H2.text: when does the cannes film festival take place. Over the Christmas holidays

H3.text: when does the cannes film festival take place. usually in May

A4.text: Held in Cannes, France, it previews new films of all genres, including documentaries, from all around the world.
